title: Serena Williams Might Play Tennis Again
summary: Serena Williams is a famous tennis player who stopped playing in 2022. Now, she can return to tennis from February 22 because she followed the rules for drug testing. This means she is allowed to join tournaments again. But Serena has not said if she will come back. She posted on social media that she is not returning, but later she did not say no to a comeback. She is 44 years old and has won 23 big tournaments. People are curious about her plans because she is a great athlete. The article talks about the rules for retired players who want to play again and what Serena has said recently.
